org.magnos.asset
Class Assets

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.Assets

public class Assets
extends Object

The main class for accessing assets. By default assets are cached, but that can be changed with setCaching(boolean). To understand how the source or format is determined given a request string look at getFormat(String), getFormat(Class), and getSource(String) respectively. The most detailed explanation on how everything is determined is described at info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo) while caching is described at get(AssetInfo).

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Detail

load

public static <A> A load(String request)
Loads an asset based solely on the request. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, null, null, null, null ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
Returns:
The requested asset.
See Also:
info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo), get(AssetInfo)

load

public static <A> A load(String request,
                         Class<A> requestType)
Loads an asset based on the request and an expected return type. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, null, requestType, null, null ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
requestType - If given, the format of the asset will be determined using the format that was registered that had this type as one of it's possible outputs. If the lookup returns nothing the normal format determination will be used.
Returns:
The requested asset.
See Also:
info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo), get(AssetInfo)

public static <A> A load(String request,
                         String requestExtension)
Loads an asset based on the request and extension. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, formatExtension, null, null, null ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
requestExtension - If given, the format of the asset will be determined using the format the was registered that had this extension as one of it's possible inputs. If the lookup returns nothing the normal format determination will be used. This argument is ignored if requestType is provided.
Returns:
The requested asset.
See Also:
info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo), get(AssetInfo)

load

public static <A> A load(String request,
                         AssetInfo requestInfo)
Loads an asset based on the request and user specified AssetInfo. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, null, null, null, requestInfo ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
requestInfo - If given, this AssetInfo is set and used to load the asset. Otherwise The AssetInfo is determined by requestType if given, or the default AssetInfo for the determined AssetFormat.
Returns:
The requested asset.
See Also:
info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo), get(AssetInfo)

loadFrom

public static <A> A loadFrom(String request,
                             String sourceName)
Loads an asset from a specified source based solely on the request. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, null, null, sourceName, null ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
sourceName - If given, the source of the asset will be determined using this name to lookup an AssetSource. If the lookup returns nothing the normal source determination will be used.
Returns:
The requested asset.

loadFrom

public static <A> A loadFrom(String request,
                             String sourceName,
                             String requestExtension,
                             AssetInfo requestInfo)
Loads an asset from a specified source based on the request, extension, and user specified AssetInfo. This is equivalent to: 
 get( info( request, requestExtension, null, sourceName, requestInfo ) )

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset.
sourceName - If given, the source of the asset will be determined using this name to lookup an AssetSource. If the lookup returns nothing the normal source determination will be used.
requestExtension - If given, the format of the asset will be determined using the format the was registered that had this extension as one of it's possible inputs. If the lookup returns nothing the normal format determination will be used. This argument is ignored if requestType is provided.
requestInfo - If given, this AssetInfo is set and used to load the asset. Otherwise The AssetInfo is determined by requestType if given, or the default AssetInfo for the determined AssetFormat.
Returns:
The requested asset.
See Also:
info(String, String, Class, String, AssetInfo), get(AssetInfo)

get

public static <A> A get(AssetInfo info)
Gets an asset based on the provided AssetInfo. If an asset with the same path, type, and info is cached it will be returned, otherwise a new asset will be created and possibly cached for future use.

Type Parameters:
A - The type to automatically cast to.
Parameters:
info - The info to use to load an asset.
Returns:
The requested asset.
Throws:
ClassCastException - The format doesn't actually produce an asset of the expected type.

info

public static AssetInfo info(String request,
                             String requestExtension,
                             Class<?> requestType,
                             String sourceName,
                             AssetInfo requestInfo)
Builds an AssetInfo depending on the values passed in.

Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset. The full path of the asset is saved in the AssetInfo returned and may be used to cache the AssetInfo and asset.
requestExtension - If given, the format of the asset will be determined using the format the was registered that had this extension as one of it's possible inputs. If the lookup returns nothing the normal format determination will be used. This argument is ignored if requestType is provided.
requestType - If given, the format of the asset will be determined using the format that was registered that had this type as one of it's possible outputs. If the lookup returns nothing the normal format determination will be used.
sourceName - If given, the source of the asset will be determined using this name to lookup an AssetSource. If the lookup returns nothing the normal source determination will be used.
requestInfo - If given, this AssetInfo is set and used to load the asset. Otherwise The AssetInfo is determined by requestType if given, or the default AssetInfo for the determined AssetFormat.
Returns:
An AssetInfo with the given request, determined format and source, and the calculated full path of the asset.
Throws:
UnknownAssetFormatException - The format could not be determined based on request, requestExtension, requestType, or the default format.
UnknownAssetSourceException - The source could not be determined based on request, sourceName, the default source, or any other sources registered.

unload

public static void unload(String request)
Unloads the asset found with the given request if one has been cached. If the source is successfully determined and a cached asset exists it it cleared and removed from the cache.

Parameters:
request - The request used to determine formats, sources, and subsequently the full path of the asset. The full path of the asset is saved in the AssetInfo returned and may be used to cache the AssetInfo and asset.

unload

public static void unload(AssetInfo assetInfo)
Unloads the asset with the path in the given AssetInfo if one has been cached. If an AssetInfo exists with the path it will be cleared and removed from the cache.

Parameters:
assetInfo - The AssetInfo to use to unload an asset based on path.

unloadAll

public static void unloadAll()
Unloads all cached assets.

getExtension

public static String getExtension(String request)
Determine the extension of the given request. If there is no extension on the request then the entirety of the request is returned as the extension.

Parameters:
request - The request to determine the extension of.
Returns:
The extension of the request, or the request if no extension was found.

getInfo

public static AssetInfo getInfo(String path)
Returns the cached AssetInfo given the full path of an asset.

Parameters:
path - The full path of an asset.
Returns:
The cached AssetInfo or null if none exists.

public static AssetSource getDefaultSource()
Gets the default AssetSource.

Returns:
The default source if any exists.
See Also:
getSource(String)

public static void setDefaultSource(AssetSource source)
Sets the default AssetSource.

Parameters:
source - The new default AssetSource.
See Also:
getSource(String)

setDefaultSource

public static void setDefaultSource(String name)
Sets the default AssetSource based on name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the AssetSource that should be the default source.
See Also:
getSource(String)

addSource

public static void addSource(String name,
                             AssetSource source)
Adds a new possible source with the given name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the source. This can be used on any of the loadFrom methods to specify the source directly.
source -

getSource

public static AssetSource getSource(String request)
Returns a source based on the given request. If the default AssetSource is non-null and it finds the request valid, it will be returned. Otherwise all sources will be iterated and the first valid source will be returned. If no valid source is returned the default source is returned even if the request was not valid for it.

Parameters:
request - The request to use to determine a source for.
Returns:
The source determined.

getDefaultFormat

public static AssetFormat getDefaultFormat()
Gets the default AssetFormat.

Returns:
The default format if any exists.
See Also:
getFormat(Class), getFormat(String)

setDefaultFormat

public static void setDefaultFormat(AssetFormat format)
Sets the default AssetFormat.

Parameters:
format - The new default AssetFormat.
See Also:
getFormat(Class), getFormat(String)

setDefaultFormat

public static void setDefaultFormat(String extension)
Sets the default AssetFormat.

Parameters:
extension - The extension of the AssetFormat that should be the default format.
See Also:
getFormat(Class), getFormat(String)

addFormat

public static void addFormat(AssetFormat format)
Adds a new format based on the format's extensions and available request types. If there are already AssetFormats registered with any of the extensions or request types they will be override with this format.

Parameters:
format - The AssetFormat to add.

addFormats

public static void addFormats(AssetFormat... formats)
Adds new formats based on the format's extensions and available request types. If there are already AssetFormats registered with any of the extensions or request types they will be override with this format.

Parameters:
formats - The array of AssetFormat to add.

getFormat

public static AssetFormat getFormat(String request)
Returns a format based on the given request. The extension of the request is used to lookup a format, if none were found the default format is returned.

Parameters:
request - The request to use to determine a format for.
Returns:
A format of the request or null if none could be determined.

getFormat

public static AssetFormat getFormat(Class<?> requestType)
Returns a format based on the given request. The request type is used to lookup a format, if none were found the default format is returned.

Parameters:
requestType - The type to use to determine a format for.
Returns:
A format of the request type or null if none could be determined.

setCaching

public static void setCaching(boolean cache)
Enables or Disables asset caching. By default assets will be cached.

Parameters:
cache - True if assets should be cached, otherwise false.

isCaching

public static boolean isCaching()
Whether asset caching is enabled or disabled.

Returns:
True if caching is enabled, otherwise false.

getCacheHits

public static int getCacheHits()
Returns:
The number of assets returned that were cached and didn't have to be re-loaded.

getCacheMisses

public static int getCacheMisses()
Returns:
The number of assets that had to be loaded and did not take advantage of caching.

reset

public static void reset()
Removes all formats, sources, and their defaults.
